description: In the old town, a simple and informal location (but on the floor below there are two rooms between the Roman walls of Aosta!) for a cuisine of remarkable quality: the chef often starts from local traditions to develop them into more creative dishes, whose protagonists are often mountain products.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
